mapper.insert: insert into office_create(oc_id, member_id, office_id) values( oc_seq.nextval, #{memberId}, #{officeId} )

insert into position(position_id, office_id, position_name, position_level) values( position_seq.nextval, #{officeId}, #{positionName}, #{positionLevel} )
select position_seq.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
insert into annual_vacation(av_id, office_id, annual, vacations) values( av_seq.nextval, #{officeId}, #{annual}, #{vacations})

insert into department(department_id, office_id, department_name) values( department_seq.nextval, #{officeId}, #{departmentName})
select department_seq.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.select: select * from annual_vacation where office_id = #{officeId} and annual = #{annual}
select o.office_id,o.office_name, o.office_code from office o join office_create c on o.office_id = c.office_id where c.member_id = #{memberId}
